name: Blue & Red (Graystripe2000)
description:
Challenged myself to make a game in Unity within one week, and this is the result.  

Help the blue guy reach the red guy in nine levels. 

Controls: 

* Arrow keys to move

* Space to jump

To download game: 

*Click download

*Unzip folder

*Enjoy game

NOTE: You May have to re-arrange the position of certain folders to get the game to work.

Assets used: 

*Pixel Adventure 1 by Pixel Frog

*Retro game SFX by GrumpyDiamondAssets 

*Free Music Tracks for Games by Rizwan Ashraf
